title: Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Three Washstands with Three Bidets", ca. 1805
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Three washstands with bidets; upper plan, section and elevation; upper right, plan, section and elevation; lower, section and elevation. Lower left, scale.

Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Three Washstands with Three Bidets", ca. 1805.
